document_data.name: Kingsport
document_data.mainbody:
'''Kingsport''' was an ''[[awaken]]ed'' [[giant penguin]] that became an unwilling servant of the [[arcanaloth]] [[Scrivenscry]].

{{Quote|Ah, you must be the librarians! Scrivenscry has need of your assistance.|Kingsport, to a group of adventurers.}}
document_data.Description: The giant flightless bird stood about {{SIAdj|5|ft|adj=tall}} and had no visible eyes. They were in fact entirely blind. Kingsport was forced to wear a leather harness.
document_data.Personality: Kingsport was forced into sentience, and compelled to work against their own will. They had an especially anxious personality.
document_data.Abilities: The ''awakened'' beast had [[blindsight]] that extended upwards of {{SI|30|ft}} and could hold its breath up to 20 minutes at a time.
document_data.Activities: Kingsport was forced to push around a cart into which Scrivenscry could dump anything they found to be of value.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1489}}, Kingsport accompanied Scrivenscry on a journey into the long-abandoned [[Netherese enclave|Netherese city]] of [[Ythryn]], which remained frozen over beneath the [[Reghed Glacier]].
